name: Big Red (BIGRED11.WAD, v1.2)
description: This is a "stream of consciousness" wad. In other words: I made it up as I went along. And since I'd like to have you, the player(s), do the same, so to speak, no detailed description or story.txt is provided. If your favorite color is red, you'll be VERY happy here.... If you don't like red (or can't SEE red), my appologies. Maybe next time I'll do Big Blue.
